item.title: Leonardo DiCaprio Details How He Pursues Hollywood’s Top Directors: “I Let Them Know I’m Ready and Game If They Are”
item.description: The star is teaming up with Paul Thomas Anderson for the first time in ‘One Battle After Another,’ almost 30 years after turning down ‘Boogie Nights.’

item.title: Leonardo DiCaprio Details How He Pursues Hollywood’s Top Directors: “I Let Them Know I’m Ready and Game If They Are”
item.description: The star is teaming up with Paul Thomas Anderson for the first time in ‘One Battle After Another,’ almost 30 years after turning down ‘Boogie Nights.’

item.title: Regina Hall Wants It All
item.description: After decades as a comedy star, the actress turns serious for her breakout part in Paul Thomas Anderson’s ‘One Battle After Another.’

item.title: Regina Hall Wants It All
item.description: After decades as a comedy star, the actress turns serious for her breakout part in Paul Thomas Anderson’s ‘One Battle After Another.’

item.title: ‘Scary Movie’ Reboot: Anna Faris, Regina Hall Reteam With Wayans Brothers for 2026 Release
item.description: Marlon Wayans, Shawn Wayans and Keenen Ivory Wayans, who created the parody franchise that launched with the first movie in 2000, wrote the script for the new film.
